something_went_wrong:
Something went wrong while contacting server. We are sorry for the inconvinience.

 If your domain password has changed, just send change password to intiate password change.
could_not_determine_booking_time: Please specify timing details. For e.g. book conf 4 from 4 pm to 5pm or at 4pm for 1 hour
book_room_cancel_confirmation: This will cancel the current booking operation. Are you sure?
booking_creation_stop: Room booking operation has been cancelled.
room_cancellation_confirmation: This will cancel the current room cancellation operation. Are you sure?
room_cancellation_stop: Cancel booking operation has been cancelled.
